text:
Bay Minette is a city in Baldwin County, Alabama, United States. According to the 2000 census, the population of the city was 7,820. According to the 2007 U.S. Census estimates, the city had a population of 7726. The city is the county seat of Baldwin County.
Geography.
Bay Minette is located at (30.883446, -87.777183).
According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the city has a total area of. (0.50%) is water.
